verses.roman:
parvate nā caḍe dui--rūpa-sanātana
ei-rūpe tāṅ-sabāre diyāchena daraśana

synonyms: parvate—on the hill; nā caḍe—do not ascend; dui—two; rūpa-sanātana—Rūpa Gosvāmī and Sanātana Gosvāmī; ei-rūpe—in this way; tāṅ-sabāre—unto them; diyāchena—has given; daraśana—interview.
translation: The two brothers Rūpa and Sanātana did not climb the hill. To them also Lord Gopāla granted an interview.
